feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.1.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: org-wide webhooks by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15144
  • chore: Remove DeploySentinel by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15328
  • fix: install flow: wrong org team avatars by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15334
  • fix: Wrong error message when inviting by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15332
  • chore: Remove deprecated logo/avatar/away fields by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14705
  • revert: "fix: 404 collisions (#15249)" by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15339
  • chore: added apple verification by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15346
  • fix: Team and User Links by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15342
  • fix: [CAL-3578] [CAL-2733] Zoho calendar issues by @vachmara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14905
  • fix: Exclude location options for seated event by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15174
  • feat: outlook 365 connect atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15318
  • chore: removed next app dir banner by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15356
  • chore: v4.1.10 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15359

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.1.9...v4.1.10

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.1.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: trigger workflow only for first recurring event by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15128
  • feat: license creation admin PR by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15024
  • fix: event-types controller params validation by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15353
  • chore: /.well-known/ by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15362
  • fix: sidebar height being fixed for platform dashboard by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15223
  • feat: Remove minimum of 2 teams for making an Org by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15267
  • feat: Datepicker transitions by @hichemfantar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15313
  • fix: add missing migration by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15369
  • chore: Add error logging to getTOkenObjectFromCredential by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15383
  • feat: Add syntax highlighting and autocomplete menu for workflow variables by @martinsione in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15293
  • feat: go to Assignment tab after creation and warn if existing without assigning by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14882
  • fix: atoms useCheck and bump atoms version by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15390
  • refactor: v2 schedules by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15403
  • feat: generate transcription from recording and API endpoint by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15358
  • fix: fixed the padding at the footer in /signup by @Neon-20 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15394
  • fix: bookings made via API don't include the specified location by @Shaik-Sirajuddin in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15067
  • chore: Release v4.1.11 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15406

New Contributors

  • @martinsione made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15293
  • @Neon-20 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15394

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.1.10...v4.1.11

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.1.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: v2 managed user inform when access token expires by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15414
  • revert: "fix: bookings made via API don't include the specified locatiâ€¦ by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15417
  • fix: margin top in booker embed by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15412
  • chore: added platform admin to seed.ts by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15119
  • fix: reschedule and cancel unconfirmed event from email by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15013
  • refactor: recording and transcript webhook by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15419
  • chore: Upgrade Sentry in v1, v2 & web by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15396
  • chore: removed semantic-pull-requests comment by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15421
  • fix: unable to update app keys for google meet in settings/admin by @Shaik-Sirajuddin in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15203
  • chore: standalone output experiment by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15405
  • fix: pt-16 on booker by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15431
  • chore: Release v4.1.12 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15432

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.1.11...v4.1.12

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: return accessTokenExpiresAt in oauth exchange and refresh by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15425
  • feat: Twipla app analytics added by @vikaspatil0021 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14780
  • feat: Umami analytics app added by @vikaspatil0021 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14783
  • fix: Seat Attendee Rescheduling Logic by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14784
  • fix: unexpected scrolling on event-types page by @RajdeepDs in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15452
  • fix: Offer seats events invites everyone regardless their availability schedule by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15171
  • fix: added empty screen for missing platform plan by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15467
  • fix: AvailabilitySettings atom shift pencil icon after input to make it wider by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15460
  • fix: Large padding on small screens for embedded booking widgets by @RushikeshGandhmal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15463
  • chore: v4.2.0 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15482

New Contributors

  • @RajdeepDs made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15452

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.1.12...v4.2.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add date overrides to availability settings atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15459
  • fix: event type uses calvideo as location instead of user default by @Shaik-Sirajuddin in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15442
  • fix: Remove comment about private api for now. by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15493
  • fix: correctly assign status code on rate limit error by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15435
  • chore: auth on api-v2 with api-key by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15455
  • fix: your name translation by @smitgol in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14863
  • refactor: only check platform billing for platforms by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15507
  • chore: v4.2.1 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15514

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.2.0...v4.2.1
